00017 template <typename ArgumentType>
00018 class InvertFunction: public std::unary_function<ArgumentType, ArgumentType>
00019 {
00020 public:
00021        InvertFunction()
00022        {
00023               m_maxValue = std::numeric_limits<ArgumentType>::max();
00024        }
00025 
00026        inline ArgumentType operator()(const ArgumentType& value)
00027        {
00028               return (m_maxValue - value);
00029        }
00030 
00031 private:
00032        ArgumentType m_maxValue;
00033 };
00034

00039 template <typename PixelType, class Predicate> 
00040 class TUnaryTransformProcessorComp: public iipr::CImageProcessorCompBase
00041 {
00042 public:
00043        typedef iipr::CImageProcessorCompBase BaseClass;
00044 
00045 protected:           
00046        // reimplemented (iipr::CImageProcessorCompBase)
00047        virtual bool ProcessImage(
00048                             const iprm::IParamsSet* paramsPtr,
00049                             const iimg::IBitmap& inputImage,
00050                             iimg::IBitmap& outputImage);
00051 
00052 private:
00053        Predicate m_predicate;
00054 };
00055 
00056 
00057 // reimplemented (iipr::CImageProcessorCompBase)
00058 
00059 template <typename PixelType, class Predicate> 
00060 bool TUnaryTransformProcessorComp<PixelType, Predicate>::ProcessImage(
00061                      const iprm::IParamsSet* /*paramsPtr*/,
00062                      const iimg::IBitmap& inputImage,
00063                      iimg::IBitmap& outputImage)
00064 {
00065        if (!outputImage.CreateBitmap(inputImage.GetImageSize(), inputImage.GetPixelBitsCount(), inputImage.GetComponentBitsCount())){
00066               return false; // cannot create output image
00067        }
00068 
00069        iimg::TBitmapIterator<PixelType> inputIterator(&inputImage);
00070        iimg::TBitmapIterator<PixelType> outputIterator(&outputImage);
00071 
00072        while (inputIterator.IsValid()){
00073               const iimg::TBitmapIterator<PixelType>::PixelAccessor& inputPixel = *inputIterator;
00074               iimg::TBitmapIterator<PixelType>::PixelAccessor& outputPixel = *outputIterator;
00075 
00076               for (int colorComponentIndex = 0; colorComponentIndex < inputPixel.GetComponentsCount(); colorComponentIndex++){
00077                      outputPixel[colorComponentIndex] = m_predicate(inputPixel[colorComponentIndex]);
00078               }
00079 
00080               ++inputIterator;
00081               ++outputIterator;
00082        }
00083 
00084        return true;
00085 }
